                        "key5": "value5"
                    }

                        "key": "doge",
                        "children": [

                                "key": "wow",
                                "value": {
                                    "-": "",

                        "value": {

                        "value": {
                            "+": "vops"
                        }

                "value": {
                    " ": "bar"

                        "key": "value"

                    "+": "str"
                }
